au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=14m_L2=2m_offset_may_2014
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(1200,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g2 driveGuide(guideConfig.g2) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(4) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 34.89) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.97)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(36, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(44, 0) driveBsz(265)
